name: Mr. Dude's Delivery Dash
description:
A chill lo-fi game where you have to help Mr. Dude with his pending deliveries before the time runs out.

*CONTROLS*

     ↑     --------------   Accelerate

     ↓     --------------   Reverse

 ←/→   --------------   Steer

[space]  --------------   Flip direction

(it can be played with a controller, but the controls won't be that great)

This game was created in 48 hours for the Nordic Game Jam 2021.
